main.name: SoundInstance
main.description: `SoundInstance` provides a thin wrapper around the `<audio>` DOM API.

arguments.name: urls
arguments.description: An array of URLs pointing to the different sources.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: A name for this sound, to easily retrieve it later on.

arguments.name: done
arguments.description: Whether this sound has done loading. Includes errors, i.e. if an error occurred, `done` will be true.

arguments.name: error
arguments.description: Whether this sound has encountered an error while loading.

arguments.name: play
arguments.description: Play this sound. Calls `load()` (to be able to set `currentTime` when stopping) and then `play()` on the element.

arguments.name: stop
arguments.description: Stop this sound. Calls `pause()` and then sets `currentTime` to `0` on the element.
